title: Lvl 1 Spells
content: ionLevel 1 Spell Slot No Gain the service of a familiar, a fey spirit that takes an animal from of your choose.Range: 18m Wizard, Ranger Find Familiar: Cat Conjuration ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot No Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of a cat that can distract your enemies.(Lasts until the end of a long rest) Range: 18m Wizard Find Familiar: Crab Conjuration ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot No Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of a crab.
